Articles.Content:
Does anyone know of mods that add more boxes to KAS or KIS?

Anymore equipment?

Maybe Inflatables that can be carried?

Science Probes?

Radios?

Drills?

Samples?

Anything?

I know the Endurance mod adds more boxes, but only one type.

Multipurpose MKS/OKS modules adds inflatables but requires MKS/OKS to run and I can't work with that.

Could any modders make more boxes or equipment not relying on any major mods?

Some photos/ideas:

![dIjR6Oo.png](http://i.imgur.com/dIjR6Oo.png)![wIRPYJF.png](http://i.imgur.com/wIRPYJF.png)![0cvUWT3.png](http://i.imgur.com/0cvUWT3.png)

Anyone got anything else?

Any modders willing to try?

There is ASET Portable Rover [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET) and roverdude has one too and some Deployable Light Globe [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50531-Sunshine-movie-style-Deployable-Light-Globe-%28updated-7-10-2013%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50531-Sunshine-movie-style-Deployable-Light-Globe-%28updated-7-10-2013%29)

> 
> There is ASET Portable Rover [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86343-New-project-from-ASET) and roverdude has one too and some Deployable Light Globe [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50531-Sunshine-movie-style-Deployable-Light-Globe-%28updated-7-10-2013%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50531-Sunshine-movie-style-Deployable-Light-Globe-%28updated-7-10-2013%29)

Alright, thanks for that!

Any more?

[Universial Storage](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75129-Universal-Storage-1-0-90-2-%28For-KSP-0-90%29-19th-January-2015) has KAS storage wedges.

Might be rather niche for what you're looking for though.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-19T20:08:02Z" title="04/19/2015 08:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 19, 2015</time> by smjjames**

> 
> [Universial Storage](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75129-Universal-Storage-1-0-90-2-%28For-KSP-0-90%29-19th-January-2015) has KAS storage wedges.
> Might be rather niche for what you're looking for though.

Alright, cool!

Low memory as well!

Hmm, can't find anymore...

Any modders around?
What all are you looking for ?

> 
> What all are you looking for ?

More KAS/KIS boxes, and more compatible parts.

It would be cool to have more opportunities for base building.

There is also Homes by bobcat for base parts and have you used Multipurpose Colony Modules every time, I try to use Inflatables base parts the one want to attach under ground and when, I do get it on top on reload it jumps in the air and that can be bad.

> 
> There is also Homes by bobcat for base parts and have you used Multipurpose Colony Modules every time, I try to use Inflatables base parts the one want to attach under ground and when, I do get it on top on reload it jumps in the air and that can be bad.

Well, I mean KAS and KIS compatible parts because it adds more fun and activity to bases. I try to go more stock + few not very laggy mods like KAS and KIS.
I guess, but that's not for Base building.

If you find other parts that fit what you are looking for, but not inherently KAS, you do know that you can make them KAS compatible? Its a pretty simple line in the config, just use an existing KAS part as a template.
